vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὔβουλ-ος, ον,
well-advised, prudent, [Refs 6th c.BC+]: comparative, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: superlative, [Refs 5th c.BC+]. adverb -λως (v. εὔβολος): comparative -ότερον [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: superlative -ότατα [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.4.21
§ Eubulus, "good counsel"
Eubulus, (Proper name), 2Tim. 4:21*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
友布羅 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "謹慎, 審慎的"
在羅馬的基督徒 (提後 4:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
友布罗 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "谨慎, 审慎的"
在罗马的基督徒 (提后 4:21)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ơ-bu-lu; Êu-bu-lu. một cơ đốc nhân tại Rô-ma. εὖ (G2095) + βούλομαι (G1014)
